func.title: DrawDefMap

param.name: x
param.desc: Left border of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: y
param.desc: Top border of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: width
param.desc: Width of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: height
param.desc: Height of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: map_name
param.desc: Name of the map to be used from Landscape.txt.

func.desc: Draws a dynamic map within the specified rectangle over the old landscape using a given map specification from Landscape.txt.
func.remark: The Landscape.txt component is usually removed from memory after scenario initialization. To keep it in memory for later use by this command you should specify the option KeepMapCreator=1 in Scenario.txt section [Landscape].

example.text: Draws 'TheMap' over the complete landscape. 'TheMap' must be defined in Landscape.txt.
